dct_title_s: The Queen & Crescent route in connection with the railroad systems of the United States and Mexico. Local map of the Queen & Crescent route
dct_alternative_sm: The Queen & Crescent route in connection with the railroad systems of the United States and Mexico. Local map of the Queen & Crescent route.
dct_description_sm: 2 maps on 1 sheet : both sides, col. ; sheet 92 x 42 cm., each map 50 x 40 or smaller.
Shows state boundaries, railroad routes, names of cities, towns, and other points of interest.
Local map covers South Central United States.
Includes "Along the Line", a description of states on route.
Verso includes train schedules, cartouche ill. entitled: South via the beautiful Queen & Crescent ; other insigna read: Queen & Crescent Route "The Southern".
Below ill. cartouche: Poole Bros. Chicago.
dcat_keyword_sm: Inland water transportation United States Maps.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
